entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 01:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
